Posts.EditableText: Hello there. For anybody who likes blues music, read on. If you don't, better read something else I've been inspired by blues ever since i watched a documentary at college. It truely is an amazing genre. I'm in a hard rock band called Hoodwink, and i've recently decided to try out a solo project, just me, doing all the instruments, singing, recording and producing. 100% independent. My first album is a blues album, and it's called "Mornin' Blues". This is a track off the album: [url=http://www.nevetsweb.com/steveblues/songs/Come%20Back%20Baby.mp3:1kik4i0x]Listen Here[/url:1kik4i0x] Enjoy
Posts.HTML:
Hello there. For anybody who likes blues music, read on. If you don't, better read something else

I've been inspired by blues ever since i watched a documentary at college. It truely is an amazing genre. I'm in a hard rock band called Hoodwink, and i've recently decided to try out a solo project, just me, doing all the instruments, singing, recording and producing. 100% independent.

My first album is a blues album, and it's called "Mornin' Blues". This is a track off the album:

Listen Here

Enjoy
